replaceSync.Blazing path, lead me to iron rule: 被炽热灼烧过的轨迹\s*乃成铁血霸道！
replaceSync.Fleeting light! 'Neath the red moon, sco: 超新星啊，更加闪耀吧！\s*照亮红月下炽热之地！
replaceSync.Fleeting light! Amid a rain of stars, ex: 超新星啊，更加闪耀吧！\s*在星降之夜，称赞红月！
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I bare iron, in my de: 我自月而来携钢铁降临于此！
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I descend, a rain of: 我自月而来降临于此，\s*召唤星降之夜！
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I descend, upon burni: 我自月而来降临于此，\s*踏过炽热之地！
replaceSync.From on high I descend, the iron path to: 我降临于此，\s*征战铁血霸道！
replaceSync.From on high I descend, the moon and sta: 我降临于此对月长啸！\s*召唤星降之夜！
replaceSync.O hallowed moon, take fire and scorch my: 月光啊！\s*用你的炽热烧尽敌人！
replaceSync.Take fire, O hallowed moon: 炽热燃烧！\s*给予我月亮的祝福！
replaceSync.Unbending iron, descend with fiery edge: 钢铁成为我降临于此的燃烧之剑！
replaceSync.Unbending iron, take fire and descend: 钢铁燃烧吧！\s*成为我降临于此的刀剑吧！

replaceText.Meteor/Dive or Dive/Beam: 陨石/冲 或 冲/光束

replaceSync.Blazing path, lead me to iron rule: Umloderter Pfad, führe mich zur Herrschaft
replaceSync.Fleeting light! 'Neath the red moon, sco: Neues Gestirn! Glühe herab und umlodere meinen Pfad
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I bare iron, in my de: O roter Mond, als Künder deiner Herrschaft stieg ich herab
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I descend, a rain of: O roter Mond, sieh mich herabsteigen! Einer Sternschnuppe gleich
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I descend, upon burni: O roter Mond! Ich stieg herab, um deine Herrschaft zu bringen
replaceSync.From on high I descend, the hallowed moo: Seht, ich steige herab, vom rotglühenden Monde
replaceSync.From on high I descend, the iron path to: Seht, ich steige herab, um euch zu beherrschen
replaceSync.From on high I descend, the moon and sta: Ich steige herab zu Ehre des roten Mondes! Einer Sternschnuppe gleich
replaceSync.O hallowed moon, shine you the iron path: O roter Mond! Führe mich zur Herrschaft
replaceSync.O hallowed moon, take fire and scorch my: O roter Mond! Umlodere meinen Pfad
replaceSync.Take fire, O hallowed moon: Flammender Pfad, geschaffen vom roten Mond
replaceSync.Unbending iron, descend with fiery edge: Zur Herrschaft steige ich herab, auf umlodertem Pfad
replaceSync.Unbending iron, take fire and descend: Zur Herrschaft führt mein umloderter Pfad! Auf diesen steige ich herab

replaceSync.Blazing path, lead me to iron rule: La voie marquée par l'incandescence mène à la domination
replaceSync.Fleeting light! 'Neath the red moon, sco: Supernova, brille de tout ton feu et irradie la terre rougie
replaceSync.Fleeting light! Amid a rain of stars, ex: Supernova, brille de tout ton feu et glorifie la lune rouge
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I bare iron, in my de: De la lune je m'arme d'acier et descends
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I descend, a rain of: Depuis la lune, j'invoque une pluie d'étoiles
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I descend, upon burni: De la lune, je descends et marche sur la terre ardente
replaceSync.From on high I descend, the hallowed moo: Des cieux je vais descendre et révérer la lune
replaceSync.From on high I descend, the iron path to: Du haut des cieux, je vais descendre pour conquérir
replaceSync.From on high I descend, the moon and sta: Du haut des cieux, j'appelle une pluie d'étoiles
replaceSync.O hallowed moon, shine you the iron path: Ô lune! Éclaire la voie de la domination
replaceSync.O hallowed moon, take fire and scorch my: Que l'incandescence de la lune brûle mes ennemis
replaceSync.Take fire, O hallowed moon: Baignez dans la bénédiction de la lune incandescente
replaceSync.Unbending iron, descend with fiery edge: Fier acier! Sois ma lame plongeante et deviens incandescent
replaceSync.Unbending iron, take fire and descend: Ô noble acier! Rougis ardemment et deviens ma lame transperçante

replaceSync.Bahamut Prime: バハムート・プライム
replaceSync.Blazing path, lead me to iron rule: 赤熱し、焼かれし道を\s*鉄の覇道と成す！
replaceSync.Fleeting light! 'Neath the red moon, sco: 超新星よ、輝きを増せ！\s*紅月下の赤熱せし地を照らせ！
replaceSync.Fleeting light! Amid a rain of stars, ex: 超新星よ、輝きを増せ！\s*星降りの夜に、紅月を称えよ！
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I bare iron, in my de: 我、月より鉄を備え\s*舞い降りん！
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I descend, a rain of: 我、月より舞い降りて\s*星降りの夜を招かん！
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I descend, upon burni: 我、月より舞い降りて\s*赤熱せし地を歩まん！
replaceSync.From on high I descend, the hallowed moo: 我、舞い降りて\s*月を仰がん！
replaceSync.From on high I descend, the iron path to: 我、舞い降りて\s*鉄の覇道を征く！
replaceSync.From on high I descend, the moon and sta: 我、舞い降りて月を仰ぎ\s*星降りの夜を招かん！
replaceSync.Nael Deus Darnus: ネール・デウス・ダーナス
replaceSync.O hallowed moon, shine you the iron path: 月よ！\s*鉄の覇道を照らせ！
replaceSync.O hallowed moon, take fire and scorch my: 月よ！\s*赤熱し、神敵を焼け！
replaceSync.Unbending iron, descend with fiery edge: 鉄よ、舞い降りし\s*我の刃となり赤熱せよ！
replaceSync.Unbending iron, take fire and descend: 鉄よ、赤熱せよ！\s*舞い降りし我が刃となれ！

replaceText.Aetheric Profusion: エーテリックプロフュージョン
replaceText.Bahamut Marker: バハムート マーク
replaceText.Chain Lightning: チェインライトニング
replaceText.Dive . Dynamo/Chariot: ダイブ + ダイナモ/チャリオット
replaceText.Dive Dynamo Combo: ダイブ ダイナモ コンボ
replaceText.Dynamo . Beam/Chariot: ダイナモ + ビーム/チャリオット
replaceText.Meteor/Dive or Dive/Beam: メテオ/ダイブ や ダイブ/ビーム
replaceText.Thermionic . Dynamo/Chariot: サーミオニック + ダイナモ/チャリオット
replaceText.Thermionic Beam: サーミオニックビーム
replaceText.Thermionic Burst: サーミオニックバースト
replaceText.Wings of Salvation: サルヴェーションウィング

replaceSync.Blazing path, lead me to iron rule: 붉게 타오른 길을 강철의 패도로 만들겠노라!
replaceSync.Fleeting light! 'Neath the red moon, sco: 초신성이여, 빛을 더하라! 붉은 달 아래, 붉게 타오르는 땅을 비춰라!
replaceSync.Fleeting light! Amid a rain of stars, ex: 초신성이여, 빛을 더하라! 유성이 쏟아지는 밤에, 붉은 달을 우러러보라!
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I bare iron, in my de: 달로부터 강철의 패도를 거쳐 흉조가 내려오리라!
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I descend, a rain of: 달로부터 흉조가 내려와 유성이 쏟아지는 밤이 도래하리라!
replaceSync.From hallowed moon I descend, upon burni: 달로부터 흉조가 내려와 붉게 타오르는 땅을 걸으리라!
replaceSync.From on high I descend, the moon and sta: 흉조가 내려와, 달을 올려다보니 유성이 쏟아지는 밤이 도래하리라!
replaceSync.O hallowed moon, take fire and scorch my: 달이여! 붉게 타올라 신의 적을 태워버려라!
replaceSync.Unbending iron, descend with fiery edge: 강철이여, 흉조가 내려오는도다! 그 칼날이 되어 붉게 타올라라!
replaceSync.Unbending iron, take fire and descend: 강철이여, 붉게 타올라라! 흉조가 내려오니 그 칼날이 되어라!
